scripts.scaffold: php artisan app:scaffold --env=testing && php artisan app:scaffold && php artisan horizon:clear
scripts.bootstrap: composer install && php artisan storage:link && php artisan horizon:install && npm run scaffold
scripts.elastic: php artisan elastic:migrate:refresh && php artisan scout:import "App\Models\Card"
scripts.docker:remove:volumes: docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -qf dangling=true)
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:remove:containers && npm run docker:remove:images && npm run docker:remove:volumes
scripts.docker:build:prod: cp-cli ~/.aws/credentials ./aws_credentials && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --no-cache --progress=plain --secret id=aws,src=aws_credentials --build-arg NEW_RELIC_AGENT_VERSION=9.13.0.270 -f .docker/php/production/Dockerfile -t main-frontend-production-php . && docker build --no-cache -f .docker/web/production/Dockerfile . -t main-frontend-production-nginx
scripts.docker:fresh:prod: npm run docker:stop:prod && npm run docker:build:prod && npm run start:prod
